name: KaniKaiju
description:
Made for MiniJam Frogs² : https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-106-frogs
- Frog-like game
- Time limit

Bonus make you Kaiju for a limited time
after that game speed up by 10%

Movement :
- arrow
- WASD

Have fun !


Assets :
- mostly kenney.nl
- crab : https://camacebra.itch.io/crab-pixel-art
- fx generated with bfxr
